lyrics.japanese: チート gifted 荒技 wanted
lyrics.romaji: Chīto gifted arawaza wanted
lyrics.english: Cheat gifted, outrageous technique wanted

lyrics.japanese: 禁忌 禁じ手 明らか盲点
lyrics.romaji: Kinki kinjite akiraka mōten
lyrics.english: Taboo, forbidden move, obvious blind spot

lyrics.japanese: 反則 異次元 この世のもんでは無いです
lyrics.romaji: Hansoku ijigen kono yo no mon de wa nai desu
lyrics.english: Foul, other-dimensional — not of this world

lyrics.japanese: 無理ゲー それ聞いてないって
lyrics.romaji: Murigē sore kiitenai tte
lyrics.english: Impossible game — I wasn’t told about that

lyrics.japanese: Ay ライバル口を揃えて
lyrics.romaji: Ay raibaru kuchi o soroete
lyrics.english: Ay, rivals all saying the same thing

lyrics.japanese: Woo ライバル口を揃えて
lyrics.romaji: Woo raibaru kuchi o soroete
lyrics.english: Woo, rivals all speaking in unison

lyrics.japanese: バグで まぐれ 認めねーゼッテー
lyrics.romaji: Bagu de magure mitomenee zettē
lyrics.english: Call it a bug or a fluke — I’ll never admit it

lyrics.japanese: マジで? コレおま全部生身で?
lyrics.romaji: Maji de? Kore oma zenbu namami de?
lyrics.english: Seriously? You did all this with just your body?

lyrics.japanese: It's 生身 it's 生身 yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
lyrics.romaji: It's namami it's namami yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
lyrics.english: It’s raw, it’s real — yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

lyrics.japanese: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
lyrics.romaji: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
lyrics.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born

lyrics.japanese: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
lyrics.romaji: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
lyrics.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born

lyrics.japanese: 実力を発揮し切る前に
lyrics.romaji: Jitsuryoku o hakki shikiru mae ni
lyrics.english: Before I can fully display my skill

lyrics.japanese: 相手の方がバックれてくらしい
lyrics.romaji: Aite no hō ga bakkurete kurashii
lyrics.english: Looks like my opponent runs away first

lyrics.japanese: 上がり切るハードル very happy
lyrics.romaji: Agarikiru hādoru very happy
lyrics.english: Clearing the hurdle completely — very happy

lyrics.japanese: あきらかにダントツでピカイチ
lyrics.romaji: Akiraka ni dantotsu de pikaichi
lyrics.english: Clearly number one by a long shot

lyrics.japanese: 相変わらず脱皮してる毎日 (bling, bling, bling)
lyrics.romaji: Aikawarazu dappi shiteru mainichi (bling, bling, bling)
lyrics.english: Still shedding my skin every day (bling, bling, bling)

lyrics.japanese: 誰の七光も要らないお前の ice より icy (icy)
lyrics.romaji: Dare no nanahikari mo iranai omae no ice yori icy (icy)
lyrics.english: I don’t need anyone’s shine — icier than your ice (icy)

lyrics.japanese: 俺 パッと見出来ない事ばっかりだけど very happy
lyrics.romaji: Ore patto mi dekinai koto bakkari dakedo very happy
lyrics.english: I seem incapable at first glance, but very happy

lyrics.japanese: あ キレてる呆れてる周り 恵まれてる家族友達 (happy)
lyrics.romaji: A, kireteru akireteru mawari megumareteru kazoku tomodachi (happy)
lyrics.english: Ah, people are mad, shocked — I’m blessed with family and friends (happy)

lyrics.japanese: もう反則的立ち位置 皆俺に任せとけば良い (bang, bang, bang)
lyrics.romaji: Mō hansokuteki tachiichi minna ore ni makasetokeba ii (bang, bang, bang)
lyrics.english: An unfair position — everyone can just leave it to me (bang, bang, bang)

lyrics.japanese: 教科書に無い 問題集に無い 超 bad な呪(まじな)い listen
lyrics.romaji: Kyōkasho ni nai mondai-shū ni nai chō bad na majinai listen
lyrics.english: Not in textbooks, not in workbooks — a super bad curse, listen

lyrics.japanese: 鏡よ鏡 答えちゃって
lyrics.romaji: Kagami yo kagami kotaechatte
lyrics.english: Mirror, mirror, answer me

lyrics.japanese: Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh, yeah
lyrics.romaji: Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh, yeah
lyrics.english: Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh, yeah

lyrics.japanese: 生身のまま行けるとこまで
lyrics.romaji: Namami no mama ikeru toko made
lyrics.english: Go as far as I can in the flesh

lyrics.japanese: To the next, to the 1番上
lyrics.romaji: To the next, to the ichiban ue
lyrics.english: To the next, to the very top

lyrics.japanese: Now singin', bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born (now singin')
lyrics.romaji: Now singin', bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born (now singin')
lyrics.english: Now singin', bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born (now singin')

lyrics.japanese: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born (now singin')
lyrics.romaji: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born (now singin')
lyrics.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born (now singin')

lyrics.japanese: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
lyrics.romaji: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
lyrics.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born

lyrics.japanese: To the next, to the 1番上
lyrics.romaji: To the next, to the ichiban ue
lyrics.english: To the next, to the very top

lyrics.japanese: Eyday 俺のままで居るだけで超 flex
lyrics.romaji: Eyday ore no mama de iru dake de chō flex
lyrics.english: Eyday, just being myself is super flex

lyrics.japanese: Eyday 誰も口を挟めない (don't test)
lyrics.romaji: Eyday dare mo kuchi o hasamenai (don't test)
lyrics.english: Eyday, no one can interrupt me (don't test)

lyrics.japanese: Eyday 俺のままで居るだけで超 flex
lyrics.romaji: Eyday ore no mama de iru dake de chō flex
lyrics.english: Eyday, just being myself is super flex

lyrics.japanese: Eyday 誰も口を挟ませない (don't test)
lyrics.romaji: Eyday dare mo kuchi o hasamasenai (don't test)
lyrics.english: Eyday, I won’t let anyone interrupt me (don't test)

lyrics.japanese: Yeah, yeah, yeah 学歴も無い前科も無い余裕で (bling-bling)
lyrics.romaji: Yeah, yeah, yeah gakureki mo nai zenka mo nai yoyū de (bling-bling)
lyrics.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah — no degree, no criminal record, all with ease (bling-bling)

lyrics.japanese: この存在自体が文化財な脳味噌 (bling-bling)
lyrics.romaji: Kono sonzai jitai ga bunkazai na nōmiso (bling-bling)
lyrics.english: This very existence is a cultural-treasure brain (bling-bling)

lyrics.japanese: 高級車は買える免許は無い愛車 (green, green)
lyrics.romaji: Kōkyūsha wa kaeru menkyo wa nai aisha (green, green)
lyrics.english: I can buy luxury cars, but my beloved ride has no license (green, green)

lyrics.japanese: 全国各地揺らす逸品 このベロが bling-bling
lyrics.romaji: Zenkoku kakuchi yurasu ippin kono bero ga bling-bling
lyrics.english: A masterpiece shaking Japan — this tongue is bling-bling

lyrics.japanese: バレットなら満タン 関西訛り生身のコトダマ
lyrics.romaji: Baretto nara mantan Kansai namari namami no kotodama
lyrics.english: If it's a bullet, it's full — Kansai-accented, living words of the soul

lyrics.japanese: 音楽 幸運 勝利の女神 今宵も三股 bang, bang
lyrics.romaji: Ongaku kōun shōri no megami koyoi mo sanmata bang, bang
lyrics.english: Music, luck, goddess of victory — tonight too, triple connections, bang, bang

lyrics.japanese: 漫画みたいな輩とまんまで張りあえてしまってる漫画
lyrics.romaji: Manga mitaina yatsura to manma de hariaete shimatteru manga
lyrics.english: Matching blows as I am with manga-like fellows — it’s like a manga

lyrics.japanese: 圧倒的チカラこの頭と口から
lyrics.romaji: Attōteki chikara kono atama to kuchi kara
lyrics.english: Overwhelming power from this head and mouth

lyrics.japanese: この身体 tattoo は入って無い
lyrics.romaji: Kono karada tattoo wa haitte nai
lyrics.english: This body has no tattoos

lyrics.japanese: このツラに傷もついて無い
lyrics.romaji: Kono tsura ni kizu mo tsuite nai
lyrics.english: This face has no scars

lyrics.japanese: 繰り返しやらかしてくダメージが
lyrics.romaji: Kurikaeshi yarakashiteku damēji ga
lyrics.english: The repeated damage I cause

lyrics.japanese: イカつい年輪を刻む皺
lyrics.romaji: Ikatsui nenrin o kizamu shiwa
lyrics.english: Carves fierce rings of age into wrinkles

lyrics.japanese: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
lyrics.romaji: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born
lyrics.english: Bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang, bling-bang-bang-born

lyrics.japanese: 俺のままで bling して bang して bang する為に born して来たニッポン (ayy)
lyrics.romaji: Ore no mama de bling shite bang shite bang suru tame ni born shite kita Nippon (ayy)
lyrics.english: I was born in Japan to bling, bang, and bang just as I am (ayy)

lyrics.romaji: Kagami yo kagami kotaechatte
lyrics.english: Mirror, mirror, answer me
